strings.string: Expire the requested content in the browser the specified number of seconds after which it is accessed. When this value is not supplied, the content will expire after the "Default Expiry" period.

Expire the requested content in the accelerator proxy the specified number of seconds after which it is accessed. When this value is not supplied, the 's-maxage' cache header attribute will not be sent.
Using blank default value - equal to %1$s (currently %2$s)
This option can only be enabled/disabled in System Configuration.
